dataStructure.name: tip.ServiceTemplate
dataStructure.description:
Represents a type of Service Specification introduced for the purposes of Service Fulfillment. It defines specific ServiceSpecCharacteristicsValues for the globally set ServiceSpecCharacteristics that can be dynamically referenced by multiple Service instances during their lifecycle span. A ServiceTemplate is checked against its associated ServiceDefinition by verifying the presence of the ServiceSpecCharacteristics and the validity of the corresponding assigned ServiceSpecCharacteristicsValues.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ServiceTemplate

child.name: stStatus
child.description:
The state of the Service Template; it may take on one of the following values: Draft, Pilot, Commercial, Retired.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: stStatus

child.name: serviceLocation
child.description:
Gives the URL of where the service component activation OS is actually located.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: serviceLocation

child.name: source
child.description:
Determines whether the source of the OS providing the Service Template is external or internal to a given organization.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: source

child.name: serviceDefinition
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association ServiceDefinitionValidates

This association end is optional
child.label: serviceDefinition

child.name: serviceSpecification
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association ServiceSpecFurtherDefinedByServiceTemplate

This association end is optional
child.label: serviceSpecification
